text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, cun zanoni mu'mine, ki muhocirat (tarki Vatan) kardaand, ʙa nazdaton ojand, onhoro ʙisanced. Xudo ʙa imonason donotar ast. Pas agar donisted, ki imon ovardaand, nazdi kofiron ʙozason nagardoned. Zero inho ʙar mardoni kofir halol nestand va mardoni kofir niz ʙar onho halol nestand. Va har ci on kofiron ʙaroi in guna zanon nafaqa kardaand, ʙipardozed. Va agar onhoro nikoh kuned va mahrasonro ʙidihed, gunohe nakardaed. Va zanoni kofiri xudro nigoh nadored. Va har ci nafaqa kardaed, az mardoni kofir ʙixohed va onho niz har ci xazina (nafaqa) kardaand, az sumo ʙixohand. In hukmi Xudost. Xudo mijoni sumo hukm mekunad, va U donovu hakim ast
